name: Zombie Shooter V1.0
description:
Welcome to Zombie Shooter! In this game you have to kill the zombies, take coins for buy skin, chest,  weapons and many gadgets! Good luck and watch out for the zombies!

Keys:
- Use W, A, S, D to move,
- Use Z to throw the grenades,
- Use X to launch mines,
- Use P to pause,
-Use the SPACEBAR to use your special skill!

-Use left button to shot
